long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Twitter Spaces Recording for FREE with Space Make.

This extension allows you to download X (formerly Twitter) Spaces easily & for free. 

You can also use it to generate transcript, summary, blog posts, tweets, threads and more with Space Make AI.

How to download Twitter Spaces Audio:

1. Open twitter/x.com spaces URL
2. Open the Space Make Extension (it will auto detect your URL) & hit download button
3. Alternatively you can open the Space Make extension or web app, paste your spaces URL & hit download. 

How to turn Twitter Spaces into Transcript, Summary & Content with AI:

1. Open twitter/x.com spaces URL
2. Open the Space Make Extension (it will auto detect your URL) & hit download & generate content button.
3. Our tool will automatically process and provide you with content

Things you can do with SpaceMake.io:

- Download Twitter Spaces Audio
- Generate Summary & Key Highlights
- Generate Blogs, threads, tweets, videos (coming soon) and more...
- Promote your space and gain real organic listeners
